item.title: An accounting manager on getting the career you want
item.description: Always with a goal in mind, Ian Petersen worked his way through his Bachelor’s and Master’s in Business Administration degrees while working full-time, and ended up in a career he wanted. Through this journey, he has learned many valuable lessons. Read Ian’s story to see how he got to where he is today and to gain great insights into how you can break into today’s job market.
